pinnedContacts.helperText: Note: A maximum of 4 contacts can be pinned.

about_us.aboutUsFirstParagraph: Surakshya is the result of the hard work and dedication of the talented team at Incubate Nepal, which brought together a group of six talented high schoolers from across Nepal to connect and collaborate. Incubate Nepal is an 8-week virtual program that connects students from all over Nepal to collaborate on open-ended projects. These students are matched with accomplished mentors as they navigate through their projects in small teams.
about_us.aboutUsSecondParagraph: This program was founded by a group of MIT and Harvard graduates to make project-based learning more accessible to students in Nepal. In addition to connecting students from all over Nepal, this virtual program offers mentorship and exposure to open-ended projects.
about_us.ourTeamFirstParagraph: The team behind Surakshya is a group of passionate individuals who believe in the power of technology to make a difference. Our team consists of an experienced mentor, a peer mentor, and six diligent high schoolers who have come together to create a comprehensive solution for women's safety.
about_us.ourTeamSecondParagraph: We have meticulously designed Surakshya to meet the specific needs of women, ensuring that it provides the necessary features and resources to enhance personal safety. Through continuous research and development, we strive to improve and update the app to stay at the forefront of safety technology. With Surakshya, we aim to empower women, provide them with a sense of security, and contribute to creating a society where women can thrive without fear.

about_app.aboutSurakshyaSubHeader: Surakshya - A Steadfast Digital Safety Guardian
about_app.first_paragraph: Introducing Surakshya, a powerful react native application developed specifically for women's safety, security, and welfare.
about_app.second_paragraph: Surakshya is designed with a strong focus on personal safety, offering a range of safety resources for women in an accessible and simplified manner. With this app, we aim to empower women by equipping them with the necessary tools to protect themselves.
about_app.feature_one_text: Users can anonymously report crime incidents, making valuable contributions to community safety. These self-reported incidents will also be visible on the map, keeping everyone informed about their surroundings.
about_app.feature_two_text: Utilizing crowdsourced data, Surakshya creates a comprehensive map view that visualizes reported incidents, helping users stay informed about the safety of their surroundings. The map visualization also takes into account public access data from online news portals. Surakshya leverages data from Nepal Monitor's dataset on GBV. We thank Nepal Monitor for their valuable contributions in making Surakshya reliable and functional.
about_app.feature_three_text: The app includes essential features for emergency situations, providing quick access to call, WhatsApp, Viber, SMS, and allows you to share your location with trusted contacts and reliable helplines.
about_app.feature_four_text: We have added a directory of hospitals and police stations, specifically ones where you can report crimes and file cases, ensuring users can easily find nearby medical and emergency assistance during critical times.
about_app.feature_five_text: Surakshya offers data visualizations to gain insights into safety trends and patterns in the community.
